channel.title: A Major influence on me and my Axo goals.. Chris Cornell.. RIP
channel.description: I guess the subject says it all, Sound Garden was a fundamental reason why I got involved in music in my late teens, and still has a major influence and will always be present in some way or another in my goals with the sounds I want to generate with the Axo. Chris Cornell rest in piece. (TFG) :cry:

item.title: A Major influence on me and my Axo goals.. Chris Cornell.. RIP
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

I guess the Black Hole Sun caught up with him. He was super cool and seemed like a nice guy.

Just read that it was suicide. Very sad.

Read full topic
item.source: A Major influence on me and my Axo goals.. Chris Cornell.. RIP
